changelog: mercenaries are no longer guaranteed to include cultural men at arms.
mercenary companies of cultures that have Camel Riders unlocked will no longer include tons of camels for no reason.
armored horsemen and war elephants can now appear in mercenary bands.
cats and dogs now live a bit longer, appear slightly less often, and trigger events less frequently.
it is now easier to divorce openly incestuous spouses.
peasant/populist Revolt leaders can no longer marry.
you can no longer manually add Gender Law exceptions to your held titles.
children can become more inclined to drink later in life if their guardians are a poor influence.
courtiers and guests no longer seek out new lovers when they already have a partner.
AI will now consider breaking up with their AI lovers upon marriage.
ugly characters now have significantly more varied looks, and look more believably ugly.
ugly characters now look more ugly by distorting specific facial features more than before.
characters young enough to be sitting in the main menu will now sit in front of the others.
christian faiths with Vows of Poverty will now see their priests dress no more fancy than a simple monk or nun.
a woman being close to the fertility cutoff cap now gives the 'Low Fertility' marriage penalty.
reclusive characters will no longer host feasts.
the Frothing Pustule that spawn from the Infinitely Divisible Ooze trinket will now attack Grand Proctor Beryllia in Sanguine Depths.
manifestation of Envy no longer fixates pets.
children will no longer look like they have put a leg through a rocking chair when reacting happily to rocking.
you will no longer push yourself to your death.
your courtiers will now care about their sexuality when they get lovers.
you can no longer seclude yourself for meditation when you're already meditating.
dead people looking for books will no longer behave as if alive.
it is no longer a religious experience to be an Aquarius.
women can now hunt boars themselves, and also send their daughters to do so.
loading a save no longer causes the camera to reset to the middle of Europe.
when eating your prisoners, you can now attract a non-serious disease.
you can no longer create the kingdom of Hungary more than once.
concubines should now correctly change courts together with their men.
dead children should no longer be treated for being sickly.
court Physicians should no longer ask you to punish them when they mistreat themselves.
depraved rulers can now choose to torture or mutilate their prisoners.
when executing a prisoner you will no longer just 'execute' them
column3: instead a culturally appropriate execution method will be chosen!

changelog: you can choose to Publicly Humiliate your foes to sap their prestige.
Flanders is now properly part of France.
the marriage AI has been improved.
the zoom hotkeys (page up/down) now actually work.
causes of death can now be customized.
execution method can be chosen via a priority system similar to government flavors.
lots more Wikipedia links!
concubines can now forgive you for kidnapping them.
Aztecs are now guaranteed to arrive as a feudal realm.
both homosexual characters properly get opinion modifiers when discovered during blot events.
executing foreign prisoners no longer give you tyranny, but gives you an opinion malus with everyone in their country instead.
the longest sound effects are now loaded only when they are needed.
creating Mongol Empire no longer resets laws.
favors can now be used to force matrilineal marriages if the other party is providing the woman.
no longer able to have two wars against the same opponent.
inaccessible character will not be invited to pagan feasts.
children and other characters unfit to lead troop will no longer lead siege defense.
marriages creates non-aggression pacts that can be renegotiated if the arranger of the marriage dies.
death sounds differ depending on age, gender and violency of reason for death.
children no longer request hunting rights.
discovered murderers of close kin can now be executed without opinion penalty.
Indians use the correct focus window.
eunuchs can no longer use seduction focus.
spy targets are now properly cleared upon death.
your eunuch sons will no longer get the serving maids pregnant.
you gave back the Mongols their balls.
Temujin now starts with some prestige.
you can now click on links again on Linux!
uncle opinion modifier now works correct.
you must now be at least a king level ruler in order to expel the Jews.
characters who love their spouses very much are now less likely to join holy orders.
a marriage is now dissolved if one of the spouses joins a holy order.
characters will not join Holy Orders if spouse is currently pregnant with non-bastard child.
no longer possible to start observing Ramadan if you are sick.
paranoid parents should no longer worry about potential plots against dead children.
you no longer feel like you're partying on your own when inviting people that are not your vassals.
you no longer punish yourself when a prisoner tries to flee from your prison by charming the guard.
you no longer feel bad for having a romantic relationship with your spouse.
you'll no longer try to talk to your dead children when you have the family focus.
your sparring partner no longer wields a limb-creating healing stick when he accidentally hits you.
you can no longer arrange a ball in the dungeons.
tiger hunting no longer disappears after creating a custom Empire in India.
women will now also ask for a job title if they are allowed to hold it and are more qualified than the current council member.
lovers in prison can no longer get impregnated normally.
it is no longer possible to banish your spouse or concubine.
it is no longer possible to send chancellor to the wrong province in the tutorial.
turkish portraits show blinded eyes, boils, scars and red spots correctly now.
male-only lovers events no longer triggers for women.
single-only lovers events no longer fires for married characters.
'S' can now be used as a shortcut to split an army in two.
you can no longer grant Eunuchs tribal counties.
you no longer gain religious authority for looting temples of your own religion.
Jews no longer want boar meat for their feasts.
tooltips on dead characters now list their primary tier titles.
decadence tooltip now uses a consistent amount of decimals.
Muslim rulers now correctly get a negative opinion against Byzantine emperor who renounces iconoclasm.
loading should be slightly faster.
building tooltip in the outliner now show the correct name for muslim buildings.
all spouses will now move along with courtiers that become landed, instead of just moving the first wife.
divorces now cost as much prestige as would be gained upon marrying the character.
buying indulgence for your sins from the Pope now has a better opinion and piety effect than before, but can only be done once per lifetime.
impregnation of lovers is now handled in the code.
characters can now have up to five lovers at the same time.
the Nestorians are no longer a heresy, and have their own holy order.
the decision to acknowledge bastards as your own now works again.
becoming infirm will now abort self improval ambitions.
characters now lose the ambition to get married upon becoming eunuchs or homosexual.
Cathar women can now have the same career ambitions as men.
compressed saves are now saved with meta data to improve performance.
localisation of other languages now defaults to English.
less willing to marry young male characters to older women.
color table for converter is now in 0-255 range instead of 0-1.
color table for converter can now script per CK2 title tag as well.
women can now die in childbirth, and there can be other complications, like illness and sickly infants.
concubines will no longer have marriage ambitions as they cannot get married.
concubines can now have the ambition to have a daughter.
the Aztecs, Mongols and Seljuks now spawn with more but smaller regiments.
the black bastard blood drop is now shown correctly with the new bastard dynasty system.
Louis II of Italy now has the correct Wikipedia link.
the Duke of Portucale now has an heir in 867.
Eudokia is now the Byzantine Empress for six months in 1067.
Anglo-Saxon England now has feudal elective law.
now natives no longer should spawn in Africa.
if a character of special interest dies, they will now be removed from characters of special interest.
dead spouses are now shown with the old previous/next spouse buttons.
birth rates have been reduced a lot.
posthumously born children of Doges no longer get a claim on the Republic.
the names of Interesting Muslims should now be displayed correctly.
friends and rivals events should now be a bit more common.
Gyda Eiriksdottir now has the correct father.
HoÃ«l of Nantes is no longer lowborn.
Burgonde de Bachaumont is now properly female.
more nasty plots against overly powerful dynasties.
